mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PTP_MSM_TASK
ID, PARAMETER, EXECUTE_DATE, STATUS, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP,
VALUES
#{item.id}, #{item.parameter}, #{item.executeDate}, #{item.status}, #{item.jobName}, #{item.jobGroup},
mapper.update:
UPDATE PTP_MSM_TASK

limit 100
